column4: so is there a ubuntu utility made for fast OS Switching? I'm downloading TinyXP so I can play a couple windows only games and I want a fast way of switching between both OS's
I want maybe about a 30 second wait like the windows switch users utility
VirtualBox --or-- Dualboot.  You should not be able to play Windows-based games because of lack in graphic card.  You have to consider dual-booting.
